meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as an insect repellent.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed some deet on my skin to keep mosquitoes away.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to apply deet before going camping to avoid bug bites.
meanings.sent3: The deet worked like magic, and the bugs stayed far away.
meanings.sent4: Her deet spray created an invisible shield against the pesky insects.
meanings.sent5: The deet smelled strong but kept the bugs at bay.

meanings.definition: To apply insect repellent containing deet.
meanings.sent1: I need to deet myself before going into the woods.
meanings.sent2: Remember to deet your clothes to prevent bug bites.
meanings.sent3: She would deet herself from head to toe before hiking.
meanings.sent4: He deeted his arms and legs, ready to face the outdoors.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to deet yourself if you want to avoid mosquitoes.

meanings.definition: The act of using deet to repel insects.
meanings.sent1: His deet application kept the bugs away during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The deet usage was effective in keeping the mosquitoes at bay.
meanings.sent3: She carried a bottle of deet everywhere, just in case.
meanings.sent4: The deet application was like a force field against insects.
meanings.sent5: The deet use was a lifesaver during the outdoor adventure.
